detailed_info.name: Zinc gluconate
detailed_info.description: Zinc Gluconate is used in cosmetics for its antiseptic and astringent properties. It is often used in acne treatment products, it accelerates the healing of wounds and helps the body to transform essential fatty acids used by the skin for healing. It is also found in deodorants and toothpastes.
detailed_info.regulation: The maximum permissible concentration in cosmetics is as follows: 1% (in zinc).

functions.name: Antimicrobial
functions.description: Helps slowing the growth of micro-organisms on the skin and counteracts the development of microbes

functions.name: Deodorant
functions.description: Reduces or masks unpleasant body odors

functions.name: Oral care/hygiene agent
functions.description: Provides cosmetic effects to the oral cavity (cleaning, deodorization and protection)
